timestamp.description: The start date and time of the metric in UTC.

isComplete.description: Flag that indicates if the metric is complete. For daily metrics this flag is complete if the value is based on a full day of metrics. If not all metrics have been received the value will be false.

type.description: Enumeration that defines the types that specifies the animal metrics.

unit.description: The unit of the duration, UN/CEFACT Common Code for Units of duration.

valueType.description: The type of the metric values.
